Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\lifecycle\deployment.go:596:53: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\lifecycle\health.go:572:39: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\lifecycle\health.go:620:36: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
